{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|''index-cast''}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|notes={{mark expos}}|
template&lt; class OtherIndexType &gt;
static constexpr auto /*index-cast*/( OtherIndexType&amp;&amp; i ) noexcept;
}}

Casts the index {{c|i}} of type {{tt|OtherIndexType}} into a certain integral type. 

It is equivalent to:
* {{c|return i;}}, if {{tt|OtherIndexType}} is an integral type other than {{c/core|bool}} and
* {{c|return static_cast&lt;index_type&gt;(i);}} otherwise.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|the index to be cast}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Cast index.

===Notes===
A call to this function will always return an integral type other than {{c/core|bool}}. [[cpp/iterator/is-integer-like#Integer-class type|Integer-class types]] can use the {{c/core|static_cast}} branch without loss of precision because this function's call sites are already constrained on the convertibility of {{tt|OtherIndexType}} to {{tt|index_type}}.
